languages.text: "Смею вмешаться, но в этом нет нужды. Дознание уже было проведено. Я повелел блюстителям держаться настороже еще после первого трупа, но не хотел тревожить Вашу Светлость без результатов на руках. Теперь они у меня есть. Мы схватили... хм... уже четырех преступников на местах готовящихся преступлений. И это... это не убийства. Это самоубийства".

"If I may interject, there is no need. The interrogations have already been conducted. I put the enforcers on alert as soon as the first body was discovered, though I decided not to disturb Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} until I had the results. Well, now I do. We have already arrested... let's see... four perpetrators at the scenes of crimes that had yet to take place. Those... those are not murders. They are suicides."
languages.original_text: "Смею вмешаться, но в этом нет нужды. Дознание уже было проведено. Я повелел блюстителям держаться настороже еще после первого трупа, но не хотел тревожить Вашу Светлость без результатов на руках. Теперь они у меня есть. Мы схватили... хм... уже четырех преступников на местах готовящихся преступлений. И это... это не убийства. Это самоубийства".

languages.text: 「私が何かを言うまでもありません。取り調べはすでに行われております。最初の死体が発見されてから、すぐにエンフォーサーに警戒態勢を敷かせました。ですが、何らかの結果が得られるまでは陛下のお手を煩わせないことに決めたのです。今のところ…我々は4人の犯人を、まだ犯罪の行われていない現場で捕まえております。それらは…殺人ではありません。彼らは自殺したのです」
languages.original_text: "If I may interject, there is no need. The interrogations have already been conducted. I put the enforcers on alert as soon as the first body was discovered, though I decided not to disturb Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} until I had the results. Well, now I do. We have already arrested... let's see... four perpetrators at the scenes of crimes that had yet to take place. Those... those are not murders. They are suicides."

traits.locale_text: 「私が何かを言うまでもありません。取り調べはすでに行われております。最初の死体が発見されてから、すぐにエンフォーサーに警戒態勢を敷かせました。ですが、何らかの結果が得られるまでは陛下のお手を煩わせないことに決めたのです。今のところ…我々は4人の犯人を、まだ犯罪の行われていない現場で捕まえております。それらは…殺人ではありません。彼らは自殺したのです」

languages.text: “请允许我多说一句，已经不需要进行审讯了。早在执法者发现第一具尸体的时候，我们就已经在进行审讯了。我让所有执法者保持警惕，得出结果之前不要来打扰您。而现在，我们已经得出了结果。我们已经逮捕了……我想想……逮捕了四名犯罪分子，他们还没来得及犯下罪行。那些人……那些人并非遭到谋杀，所有人都是自杀。”
languages.original_text: "If I may interject, there is no need. The interrogations have already been conducted. I put the enforcers on alert as soon as the first body was discovered, though I decided not to disturb Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} until I had the results. Well, now I do. We have already arrested... let's see... four perpetrators at the scenes of crimes that had yet to take place. Those... those are not murders. They are suicides."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我多说一句，已经不需要进行审讯了。早在执法者发现第一具尸体的时候，我们就已经在进行审讯了。我让所有执法者保持警惕，得出结果之前不要来打扰您。而现在，我们已经得出了结果。我们已经逮捕了……我想想……逮捕了四名犯罪分子，他们还没来得及犯下罪行。那些人……那些人并非遭到谋杀，所有人都是自杀。”

languages.text: « Si je puis me permettre, ce ne sera pas nécessaire. Les interrogatoires ont déjà eu lieu. J'ai mis les prévôts en état d'alerte dès que le premier cadavre a été découvert, mais j'ai décidé de ne pas déranger Votre Seigneurie avant d'obtenir des résultats. Et c'est chose faite. Nous avons déjà arrêté... Voyons... Quatre coupables sur les lieux de crimes à venir. Ce... ce ne sont pas des meurtres. Ce sont des suicides. »
languages.original_text: "If I may interject, there is no need. The interrogations have already been conducted. I put the enforcers on alert as soon as the first body was discovered, though I decided not to disturb Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} until I had the results. Well, now I do. We have already arrested... let's see... four perpetrators at the scenes of crimes that had yet to take place. Those... those are not murders. They are suicides."

traits.locale_text: « Si je puis me permettre, ce ne sera pas nécessaire. Les interrogatoires ont déjà eu lieu. J'ai mis les prévôts en état d'alerte dès que le premier cadavre a été découvert, mais j'ai décidé de ne pas déranger Votre Seigneurie avant d'obtenir des résultats. Et c'est chose faite. Nous avons déjà arrêté... Voyons... Quatre coupables sur les lieux de crimes à venir. Ce... ce ne sont pas des meurtres. Ce sont des suicides. »

languages.text: «Si me lo permite, no será necesario. Ya he llevado a cabo los interrogatorios. Alerté al personal de seguridad en cuanto se descubrió el primer cadáver, pero decidí no molestar a mi{mf|lord|lady} hasta tener los resultados. Y ahora los tengo. Hemos arrestado a... veamos... cuatro culpables en la escena de crímenes antes de que se cometieran. Y... no estamos ante asesinatos. Son suicidios».
languages.original_text: "If I may interject, there is no need. The interrogations have already been conducted. I put the enforcers on alert as soon as the first body was discovered, though I decided not to disturb Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} until I had the results. Well, now I do. We have already arrested... let's see... four perpetrators at the scenes of crimes that had yet to take place. Those... those are not murders. They are suicides."

traits.locale_text: «Si me lo permite, no será necesario. Ya he llevado a cabo los interrogatorios. Alerté al personal de seguridad en cuanto se descubrió el primer cadáver, pero decidí no molestar a mi{mf|lord|lady} hasta tener los resultados. Y ahora los tengo. Hemos arrestado a... veamos... cuatro culpables en la escena de crímenes antes de que se cometieran. Y... no estamos ante asesinatos. Son suicidios».

languages.text: "Wenn ich anmerken darf, das ist nicht nötig. Die Befragungen wurden bereits durchgeführt. Ich habe die Enforcer gleich nach dem ersten Leichenfund in Alarmbereitschaft versetzt, wollte Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} aber nicht stören, ehe mir Ergebnisse vorlagen. Tja, jetzt liegen sie mir vor. Wie haben bereits ... Moment ... vier Täter an zukünftigen Tatorten festgenommen. Das ... das sind keine Morde. Es sind Selbstmorde."
languages.original_text: "If I may interject, there is no need. The interrogations have already been conducted. I put the enforcers on alert as soon as the first body was discovered, though I decided not to disturb Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} until I had the results. Well, now I do. We have already arrested... let's see... four perpetrators at the scenes of crimes that had yet to take place. Those... those are not murders. They are suicides."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich anmerken darf, das ist nicht nötig. Die Befragungen wurden bereits durchgeführt. Ich habe die Enforcer gleich nach dem ersten Leichenfund in Alarmbereitschaft versetzt, wollte Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} aber nicht stören, ehe mir Ergebnisse vorlagen. Tja, jetzt liegen sie mir vor. Wie haben bereits ... Moment ... vier Täter an zukünftigen Tatorten festgenommen. Das ... das sind keine Morde. Es sind Selbstmorde."

languages.text: "Lafa giriyorum ama buna gerek yok. Sorgulamalar zaten yapıldı. İlk ceset keşfedilir keşfedilmez infazcıları göreve koşmuştum ama bir sonuç alana kadar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni rahatsız etmemeye karar vermiştim. Şimdiye değin yani. Henüz gerçekleşmemiş suç mahallerinden şimdiye kadar... Bakayım... Dört kişiyi tutukladık. Bunlar... Bunlar cinayet değil. İntihar."
languages.original_text: "If I may interject, there is no need. The interrogations have already been conducted. I put the enforcers on alert as soon as the first body was discovered, though I decided not to disturb Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} until I had the results. Well, now I do. We have already arrested... let's see... four perpetrators at the scenes of crimes that had yet to take place. Those... those are not murders. They are suicides."
